properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTREC
  FROM [log].[Source_Register_Table]
  WHERE [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] = '@{item().name}'
  AND [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N' AND ETL_RUN_STATUS = 'FAILED'

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'Y'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_utc_tag is null
			   and original_blob_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.File_Pattern}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Not_Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and (etl_run_status like 'FAIL%' or etl_run_status like 'RUN%')
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name

SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM @{pipeline().parameters.ErrorTableName}

body.value:
{
 "dataFactoryName":"DataFactory Name: @{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
 "pipelineName":"Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().parameters.PipelineName}",
 "messageHeader":"@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName} : Loaded With Error",
 "messageBody1":"Market Information",
 "messageBody2":"",
 "messageBody3":"Please see error in error table : @{pipeline().parameters.ErrorTableName}",
 "messageBody4":"",
 "messageBody5":"Error count : @{activity('GetErrorCount').output.firstRow.ERROR_COUNT}",
 "emailAddress":"@{pipeline().parameters.emailAddress}"
}

{
 "dataFactoryName":"DataFactory Name: @{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
 "pipelineName":"Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().parameters.PipelineName}",
 "messageHeader":"@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName} : Loaded Successfully",
 "messageBody1":"Market Information",
 "messageBody2":"",
 "messageBody3":"",
 "messageBody4":"",
 "messageBody5":"Error count : @{activity('GetErrorCount').output.firstRow.ERROR_COUNT}",
 "emailAddress":"@{pipeline().parameters.emailAddress}"
}

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT ERROR_COUNT,
  CASE WHEN ERROR_COUNT = 0 THEN 'SUCCESS'
  ELSE 'FAIL'
  END RUN_STATUS,
  CASE WHEN ERROR_COUNT = 0 THEN NULL
  ELSE 'Not all record loaded successfully'
  END COMMENT_MSG
  FROM (
        SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM @{pipeline().parameters.ErrorTableName}
)x

properties.description: Sub Master job to orchestrate multiple pipelines run. Each pipeline correspond to one tab in the Excel workbook.

source.name: Survival rate of last age class established

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT Message_Header, Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, CONCAT_WS('
',[Certifications],[Timber Sales],[Answers_DWH_Export],[Contracts],[Harvest Reconcilliation],[Major Severe Incidents], [Operations],[Other Sales],[Related Party Transactions],[Risk Opportunity Register],[Strategic Projects]) AS Error_Msg FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT('Operations - Load Report for Workbook ',x.Work_Book) AS Message_Header, ass.Ops_Representative_Email, ass.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ass.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, x.Work_Sheet, CONCAT(x.Work_Sheet,' >>> Error Count : ',CASE WHEN x.Error_Count > 0 THEN CONCAT(CAST(x.Error_Count AS VARCHAR),' >>> Not Complete') WHEN x.Error_Count = 0 AND x.Asset_Id IS NULL THEN 'Unknown >>> Failed Load' ELSE CONCAT(CAST(x.Error_Count AS VARCHAR),' >>> Successfully Loaded') END) AS Error_Count FROM ( SELECT err.Work_Book, err.Work_Sheet, err.Error_Count, wb.Asset_Id, wb.Fund_Id FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT 'Certifications' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Timber Sales' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Answers_DWH_Export' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Answers_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Contracts' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Contract_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Harvest Reconcilliation' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Major Severe Incidents' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Incident_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Operations' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Operation_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Other Sales' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Sales_Other_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Related Party Transactions' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Related_Party_Transaction_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Risk Opportunity Register' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Strategic Projects' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Strategic_Project_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' ) err ON wb.Work_Book = err.Work_Book and wb.Work_Sheet = err.Work_Sheet )x JOIN relational.Asset ass ON 1=1 WHERE ass.Asset_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Asset_ID}' AND ass.Fund_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Fund_ID}' AND ass.record_deleted_flag = 0 ) t PIVOT( MAX(Error_Count) FOR Work_Sheet IN ( [Certifications], [Timber Sales], [Answers_DWH_Export], [Contracts], [Harvest Reconcilliation], [Major Severe Incidents], [Operations], [Other Sales], [Related Party Transactions], [Risk Opportunity Register], [Strategic Projects]) ) AS pivot_table;

body.value:
{
"messageHeader":"@{item().Message_Header}",
"message1":"Below are the load status for each worksheet :",
"message2":"@{item().Error_Msg}",
"message3":"If there is error, please check in the Error Log Table",
"message4":"Thank you.",
"message5":"Datafactory Name: @{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
"message6":"Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().parameters.PipelineName}",
"emailAddress":"@{item().Ops_Representative_Email}",
"lastName":"@{item().Ops_Representative_Last_Name}",
"firstName":"@{item().Ops_Representative_First_Name}"
}

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 test.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT CONCAT('Operations - Load started for workbook ','@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') AS Message_Header,
Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name
FROM (
SELECT DISTINCT ra.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Email
FROM relational.Asset ra 
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 
AND ra.Asset_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Asset_ID}' 
AND ra.Fund_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Fund_ID}'
)z;

body.value:
{
"messageHeader":"@{item().Message_Header}",
"message1":"",
"message2":"Load started. An email will be sent after the load completion.",
"message3":"Thank you.",
"message4":"",
"message5":"Datafactory Name: @{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
"message6":"Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().parameters.PipelineName}",
"emailAddress":"@{item().Ops_Representative_Email}",
"lastName":"@{item().Ops_Representative_Last_Name}",
"firstName":"@{item().Ops_Representative_First_Name}"
}

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 test.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT ERROR_COUNT,
  CASE WHEN ERROR_COUNT = 0 THEN 'SUCCESS'
  ELSE 'FAIL'
  END RUN_STATUS,
  CASE WHEN ERROR_COUNT = 0 THEN NULL
  ELSE 'Not all Excel sheets have been loaded with no error'
  END COMMENT_MSG
  FROM (
       SELECT SUM(ERROR_COUNT) ERROR_COUNT FROM (
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
			 UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Contract_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
			 UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Incident_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Operation_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
			 UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Related_Party_Transaction_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
			 UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Sales_Other_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Strategic_Project_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
             UNION ALL
             SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM audit.OPS_Answers_Error WHERE Source_FIle = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
)x
)z

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [Fund_ID]
      ,[Asset_ID]
      ,[DatabaseName]
      ,[Group_ID]
      ,[Attribute_id]
      ,[Origin_id]
      ,[Asset_Offset]
      ,[Version_name]
      ,[IsProcessed]
	  ,'sp_FSOPConsolidated' AS sp_FSOPConsolidated
	  ,'sp_FSOPEstate' AS sp_FSOPEstate
	  ,'sp_FSOPOther' AS sp_FSOPOther
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spCon ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPConsolidated
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spEst ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPEstate
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spOth ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPOther
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' param ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_param
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
SELECT (SELECT Value FROM dbo.tbl_parameter WHERE Parameter = 'DescriptionYear') AS DescriptionYear ,  (SELECT Value FROM dbo.tbl_parameter WHERE Parameter = 'YearOffset') AS YearOffset
